content: गद्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} [गद्-यत्] To be spoken or uttered; गद्यमेतत्त्वया मम <ls>Bk. 6. 47.</ls> --द्यं Prose, elaborate prose composition, composition not metrical yet framed with due regard to harmony; one of the three classes into which all compositions may be divided; see <ls>Kāv. 1. 11.</ls>
